name: stapley rocks
text: So thankful for the service of Jerry at this location. Such a great person. Always make it a point when in town to order for pick up just to say hi to Jerry. The pizza was delicious. The brownies are amazing, just like Jerry! We are from Tucson. Just wanted to share my great  experience.

name: Arborist Standards Tree Care
text: Easy ordering fast delivery hot food thank you

name: Tina Jara
text: The atmosphere in this restaurant is great. The employees are always so friendly. My order was fresh and delivered on time. I'm excited they are finally in cottonwood. Well worth it. I will be ordering from them from now on.

name: David Pitman
text: Jerri was super friendly! Pizza was out right as I walked in the door. They took very good care of me. Service with a smile is always great!

name: Adam Mitchell
text: This Papa John's Pizza location is great. Not too far from all of the main shopping areas on the Southside. Plus a great friendly efficient crew who really seems to care about getting your order right the first time and getting it done …More

name: jennifer comstock
text: Went into the store and they gave me BBQ wings instead of Buffalo.  When I called the store I spoke with the owner. He offered to deliver us more wings and I told him that if we could just pick them up tomorrow that would be better. Not …More

name: RedInTheFace
text: Ordered my first pizza from this store today and it was really good! I ordered online as a carryout. When I arrived I was greeted with a smile and my pizza was ready to go! It was a nice treat. I'm glad we have a Papa John's here now!

name: Michael Simmons
text: Was so not happy with Papa John's pizza the employees were great but the product has takin a serious dive since the last time I have eaten there.  Yes it has been a while but your product should improve over time not worse in my opinion You are no longer the Papa of pizza

name: BC Snider
text: Second-best pizza in Cottonwood, after Acme, but they do have occasional delivery (driver-caused) issues, so your best bet is ordering take-out.

name: Rose Jordan
text: First off, I was one for the first 20 people here when the store opened. I went here alot the first year, taking some time off from pizza right now lol. The owner Geri is super friendly, kind and generous!!

name: Debra Nichols
text:
Great pizza. Great customer service.
Won't buy pizza any where else .
thank you .

name: Carla McCammon
text: Ordered pizza from here for the first time since they opened. The food is delicious and the employees are very friendly. I'm seeing a lot of negative reviews from people stating it took too long to get their food. Well, what do you expect …More

name: MARLIN ANTONIO DAVIS
text: It was a terrible experience. I ordered online, walked in, paid for the order, and they started making my order. Worst service experience I've had in a long while. Gave two stars because the pizza was fine.

name: Betty Jo
text: This is the second time I have on line ordered , got  my food on time and perfect. Love a pizza that has so much cheese it actually stretches. Welcome to Cottonwood.

name: Jeffrey Place
text: I asked for me pizza well done.   The cheese was barely melted and the dough was barely cooked.   Worse was all the toppings and cheese were loaded in the center on the pizza.     Also center of pizza was soggy.  This will be my first and last time for Papa Johns.

name: Michael Robert
text: Called to place an order for pickup and was told it would be an hour! I then figured she was quoting me for delivery so when I tried to clarify I was just picking up the woman who had answered the phone became very rude especially when I …More

name: Brian Ringsrud
text: We called in a $60 order at 4pm for a 5 pm pick up. Told that our pizza would be ready. Got there right at 5 and they hadn't even started the order. They said they had a 5:15 start for a 5:45 pick up. What?!? They have NO CLUE on how to …More

name: Niki K
text: Just ordered our pizza.  They made it wrong and when I called to have them fix it- they said it would be over an hour.  I already waited over an hour for my first pizza.  They forgot my packets of seasoning and extra pepperchini that I paid …More

name: Richard Faust
text: Horrible experience. Twice was over an hour. Went back after I ordered by phone. Said would be 40 minutes. I went to pick up and they misplaced my order. Told me another 20 to 30 minutes. Had to go to work. Asked for a refund and drove to …More

name: thad scott
text: I was pretty disappointed with my experience here. We decided to try it out on this past monday. Walked into a Crowd of people some of whom had been waiting up to an hour for their pizza. We were told it would be 40 minutes for our order. …More

name: Joshua Nowak
text: Awesome customer service, awesome Pizza... What more could you want:-)

name: Nancy Bowman
text: Very good pizza. very good selection. Employees are very friendly.

name: Just Zee
text: Food was good but overpriced. Staff is great though

name: Angelique Kim
text: I called to order for the first time all excited because I love papa johns was asked to hold for 15 mins. I hung up and decided I don't need it anymore!

name: Jim Moore
text: It's fast food pizza. What do you expect.

name: Kenny Fisher
text: It pretty good pizza but it way to exspenive inless  you get the special.Then it's not so bad.

name: liam nimmo
text: This place is new and wanted to try it my friend Dale reccomended it had the Philly pizza was excellent new has a few issuses but who doesn't this is now my favorite pizza place to eat at if you haven't tried it you should very good and they make fresh dow in front of you excellent.

name: Blake Vittoria
text: Love this place, delicious pizza always ready when i get there and they treat me like family

name: Lisa Howard
text: The wait time was horrible.  The pizza was not fresh or hot when it got here. When i ordered it they said 30 minutes,  yet they had no drivers , so it showed up 1.5 hours. Never again. Sorry

name: Ginger Winters
text: Good food but I shouldn't have to wait an hour for my pizza when they tell you 30 on the receipt

name: Mike Markle
text: Amazing food and service.

name: Scott Sanders
text: Always order for delivery and it's usually delivered before the ETA! Pizza and wings are delicious

name: Steve S.
text: The owner really cares about the food. Waay better than when they 1st opened.

name: Joan Duncan
text: Great pizza...nice employees.

name: Michelle Stadelman
text: Called for the first time to order and, of course, they don't DO the pizza I wanted even though advertised on TV constantly (Bacon Cheeseburger with pickles!)...sooooooo disappointed! So bummed out...decided not to order at all!

name: Michael Thomsen
text: Good job always good and on time.

name: Gerri Trutg
text: It's Awesome! people are great too!!

name: Celeste Leimbach
text: Love the staff here.

name: Sabrina Champ
text: Horrible attitudes in this store. My business will go elsewhere

name: Jeff VanZilen
text: Great pizza, great staff!!!

name: Laura Garza
text: Love the pizza

name: Jeff Jones
text: Very disappointed

name: Mindi Starr
text: Love this pizza the best
